name: HEALTH-E COMMERCE INCLUDING SUBSIDIARIES
sampleDescriptions: Tax and healthcare issues as they relate to flexible spending accounts (FSA) and health savings accounts (HSA). Advocating for the protection and expansion of FSA and HSA accounts.
Tax and healthcare issues as they relate to flexible spending accounts (FSA) and health savings accounts (HSA). Advocating for the protection and expansion of FSA and HSA accounts.
Support the ability of consumers who participate in medical savings accounts, such as a Flexible Savings Account (FSA) or Health Savings Account (HSA), to use those funds to purchase over-the-counter
